name: Arcane Vitality
description:
Ludum Dare 43 game

Made by:

- Caelum Sloan

- Riley Baker

- Zahra Ghavasieh

*This game contains disturbing and possibly triggering scenes. BEWARNED!*

Controls:

- [WASD] for movement

- [Mouse] to aim

- [1] to turn into an invincible bat

- [2] to stun enemies

- [Spacebar] to bite enemies
